channel.title: Some random issues
channel.description:
Bought Black Mesa last night, played it for about 5 hours. The bug reports I'm about to submit are not game-breaking by any chance, but I still think it's important to fix them. Black Mesa has the potential to be one of the best games ever, and I sure as hell want to play a part on getting it there.
1 - If you save the game while holding a grenade and then reload it, the grenade disappears. You can still throw it and the in-game model will look fine. It will also reappear if you switch out of it and back or use one. 2 - Some objects in Blast Pit are pitch black. The textures only appear if you light the flashlight on them. Probably a lighting glitch. 3 - Since my PC is not that high-end, I need to play with Godrays off. Unfortunately, I also have to disable it every time I boot the game since it looks like the switch for it is unable to save itself.
